    Chinese Version-Procedure: Get Started

    Hsiang-Ju, Chiu

    ChineseVersion_Procedure.Rmd

    簡介

    cat(utils::packageDescription("emr")$Description)

    產生 ICD-9-PCS 的兩種格式的表格: Decimal 和 Short

    供後續 ICD 格式轉換的功能使用 (convertIcdPrDecimaltoShort 和 convertIcdPrShortToDecimal)

    ICD-9-PCS

    icd9 <- ccsDxICD9$ICD
ICD_9_CM_withTwoFormat <- ICD9DxGenerateDecimalFormat(icd9)

icd9_Short <- ICD_9_CM_withTwoFormat$Short[1:10]
# c("E9500", "E9501", "E9502", "E9503", "E9504", "E9505", "E9506", "E9507", "E9508", "E9509")
icd9_Decimal <- ICD_9_CM_withTwoFormat$Decimal[1:10]
# c("E950.0", "E950.1", "E950.2", "E950.3", "E950.4", "E950.5", "E950.6", "E950.7", "E950.8", "E950.9")

    ICD-10-PCS只有short的格式
